parsed.internal_thinking:
I have placed my first settlement on Node 20, which provides access to Wood 11 (Hex 9), Brick 6 (Hex 5), and Sheep 8 (Hex 4). This is a strong 12-pip start focused on road-building materials. For my starting road, I need to choose between moving toward Node 10, Node 19, or Node 21. 

- Moving toward Node 10 (Yield: W12, B6, S8) is the most promising. It opens up Node 11, which offers 10 pips (B6, S5, W12), and Node 9, which provides a 3:1 port. This trajectory maintains high production and offers trade flexibility.
- Moving toward Node 19 leads to Node 18 (B10, S8) and Node 30 (W11, B10), which are lower yield (8 pips each).
- Moving toward Node 21 leads toward the Desert (Hex 10), which is suboptimal.

Therefore, I will place my road from 20 to 10. This positions me well for expansion toward the port or additional high-probability resource nodes. My main goal for the second placement phase will be to secure Wheat and Ore to balance my economy. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: My first settlement is on a strong Brick/Sheep/Wood base (Node 20). I am building toward Node 10 to reach the 3:1 port at Node 9 or the 10-pip Node 11. For my second settlement, I must prioritize Wheat and Ore; Nodes 42, 43, or 33 look like high-value targets if they aren't taken.
parsed.say_outloud: I'm placing my road toward the coast. Looking forward to seeing where everyone else sets up!
